metadata.title: WebPro English Translation
metadata.summary: WebPro's primary English translation. Unfortunately, as WebPro isn't fully translatable, it does fall short. WebPro 4.0 will be fully translatable.

languagePack.phrases:
The Archives: Select a Room Forum BBCode HTML Message Time User Here you can find and search through every post made. Simply enter a room, time frame, and the number of results to show and we can get started: This room has no messages.
Number of Results Per Page: Page: Oldest First: Room: View Archive The Archives User IDs (Optional): Results Format:
images/favicon.png blue
FreezeMessenger Beta 3 (DEV BUILD) You see... our incredibly high standards of admittance, or perhaps just our unjust bias, has resulted in us unfairly denying you access to this probably-not-worth-your time room. We do apologize for being such snobs... but yet, we still are. So, we must now ask you to leave. You are not a part of this group, rather you are only granted access because you are an administrator. Please respect user privacy: do not post in this group unwanted, and moreover do not spy without due reason. We're sorry, but for the time being you have been banned from the chat. You may contact an administrator for more information. We're Sorry2 This room is not an official room, and as such is not actively moderated. Please excercise caution when talking to people you do not know, and do not reveal personal information. This room is a private room between you and another individual, and is not accessible to any other user or administrator. If you would like to ignore this person right click their userName and choose "Ignore". After hours of intense computation, we have failed to locate the room you selected. You have been banned from creating rooms. Your group was successfully created at: Room creation has been disabled.
Reset Create Room Unknown Action <!DOCTYPE HTML> A list of groups who can view the room. Currently Allowed Groups: Allowed Groups A list of users who can view the room. Currently Allowed Users: Allowed Users Enable Censors Go There! This room is deleted, and as such may not be edited. A list of moderators who can delete posts from your group, kick users, and so-fourth. Current Moderators: Moderators Your group's name. Name The name for your group is already taken. You did not specify a name. You must be the owner to edit a room. Reset Edit Room
Unsuccessful Login Guest Links Hello. Please Enter Your Login Credentials Below: You appeared to have entered a wrong password. Remeber, passwords are case sensitive. No user exists with that user title. Is it possible that you have changed your name recently? Password: Remember Me for One Week?: Reset Launch Login to FreezeMessenger Username: Loading... Room Username If checked, a "ding" will sound whenever a new message is received and you aren't there to see it. Enable Audio Ding: Here's a Preview! This changes what room defaults when you first visit FreezeMessenger Default Room: This will disable default formatting some users use on their messages. Disable Formatting: Disabling effects can lead to a performance and a reduction of "client-side" lag (that not related to the server). It has no side-effects, aside from not looking as pretty. Disable Effects: This will disable image embeds in rooms that allow them, replaced with a link or alternate text. Disable Images: This will disable video embeds in rooms that allow them, replaced with a "click to activate" link. Disable Video Embeds: Users included here will be unable to contact you using private messaging. Current Users Ignored Users By default parental controls are enabled that help keep younger users safe. Check this to disable these features, however we take no responsibility for any reprecussions. Disable Parental Controls: This will show newer posts at the bottom instead of the top, as is common with many instant messenging programs. Show Old Posts First: Showing avatars will reduce the overall amount of text by hiding post times and userNames with a small avatar to represent users. Times can be viewed by moving the mouse over each message. Show Avatars: Change the theming of the messenger to your liking. "Cupertino" and "jQueryUI" are good choices. Theme: These rooms will be monitored for new posts, similar to Private IMs. Current Rooms: Watch Rooms: Choose Settings Reset Go Number of Results:
